welcome_message_body: Welcome to Antalya, the stunning coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of this enchanting destination.

restaurants.name: Acı Tantuni
restaurants.description: Acı Tantuni is a tantuni restaurant located in Muratpaşa.
restaurants.address: Ataturk Cad. (Işıklar Cad.) 1251 Sk. No:6-8, Muratpaşa

restaurants.name: Zirve Çağ Kebap ve Et  Lokantası
restaurants.description: Zirve Çağ Kebap ve Et  Lokantası is a kebab restaurant located in Antalya.
restaurants.address: Ataturk cad.sinan mah. 1265 soz. Uckapilar, Antalya

restaurants.name: Pio Gastro Bar & Bistro
restaurants.description: Pio Gastro Bar & Bistro is a restaurant located in Merkez.
restaurants.address: Tuzcular mah. Karanlık sok. No:9, 07100 Antalya

restaurants.name: Gözleme-Erişte-Yufka-Kahvaltı (Mr. King)
restaurants.description: Gözleme-Erişte-Yufka-Kahvaltı (Mr. King) is a comfort food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Arabın Yeri Şiş Köfte
restaurants.description: Arabın Yeri Şiş Köfte is a turkish restaurant located in the city.
